title: Assistant Procurement Officer Job at HT-Limited
content:
HT-Limited is Business Management Consulting firm, offering support in business development, human resources management and administration. HT-Limited is a member of the Chartered Institute of Personnel Management in Nigeria, with offices in Lagos, Nigeria and Accra, Ghana. We provide customized HR consulting solutions for employers looking to reduce risks and overhead costs, so more time can be spent on revenue generating activities.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Assistant Procurement Officer

Job Location: Ikoyi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Assistant Procurement Officer supports the Procurement Manager in sourcing, purchasing, and tracking the organization’s essential supplies and materials.
	This role is critical in ensuring that procurement processes are efficient, cost-effective, and compliant with company policies.


Key Responsibilities


	Assist in Sourcing and Purchasing
	Vendor Relationship Management
	Inventory and Stock Management
	Documentation and Record-Keeping
	Compliance and Cost Management
	Market Research and Analysis.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Supply Chain Management, or a related field
	Minimum of 1-2 years of experience in procurement or supply chain management
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and procurement software
	Strong negotiation, communication, and organizational skills
	Ability to multitask, prioritize, and manage time effectively.


Key Competencies:


	Attention to Detail
	Analytical Skills
	Negotiation and Persuasion
	Relationship Management
	Adaptability and Initiative.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV (must be in PDF) to: resumes@ht-limitedng.net using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: IT Executive Job at Ascentech Services Limited
content:
Ascentech Services Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in 2013 with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: IT Executive
Job Location: Ibefun, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We're seeking an experienced IT Engineer to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining our IT infrastructure.


Key Responsibilities


	Network Management: Design, implement, and manage network infrastructure.
	System Administration: Manage and maintain servers, databases, and applications.
	Troubleshooting: Identify and resolve technical issues.
	Security: Implement and maintain security measures.
	Collaboration: Work with teams to ensure IT solutions meet business needs.


Requirements


	Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field.
	2 - 3 years of experience in IT engineering.
	Strong knowledge of networking, system administration, and security.
	Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: cv@ascentech.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Accountant / Accounts Officer Job at Elyon Global Shipping Limited
content:
Elyon Global Shipping Limited is a leading logistics and shipping company dedicated to providing tailored freight services that emphasize quick transit times, cost-cutting opportunities and continuous communication. With expertise in air and sea consolidation and forwarding, we offer individually customized solutions to meet the unique needs of our clients. Our team is committed to delivering exceptional service, ensuring seamless transactions and fostering long-term relationships with our partners and customers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant / Accounts Officer

Job Location: Lagos

Key Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Handle daily financial transactions, ledger updates and reconciliations timely.
	Prepare and submit accurate monthly, quarterly and annual financial reports
	Manage statutory filings such as VAT, PAYE and WHT
	Maintain proper accounts payable and receivable processes
	Assist in budgeting, forecasting and cost control
	Ensure adherence to accounting policies, financial regulations and audit requirements.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related discipline
	1 year of experience experience in an accounting role (logistics/maritime sector experience is an advantage), NYSC members are also encouraged to apply.
	Proficient in accounting software such as QuickBooks, Sage, or Zoho Books and Microsoft Packages.
	Strong analytical, organizational and communication skills.
	ICAN or ACCA certification is an added advantage.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@elyonship.com and copy info@elyonship.com using “Accountant / Accounts Officer” as the subject of the email.

title: Digital Marketer Job at Aspom Travel Agency
content:
Aspom Travel Agency was founded on the 2nd of February, 2012 and has remained at the top of its game providing visa assistants, hotels, holiday packages, tours and flight deals to her clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketer
Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We arelooking for an experienced Digital Marketing Specialist to join our team.
	In this role, you will be responsible for developing, implementing, and managing online marketing strategies to increase brand awareness, drive traffic, and generate leads.
	The ideal candidate has a strong background in digital marketing, SEO, social media, and analytics.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute digital marketing campaigns across multiple platforms (Google Ads, social media, email, etc.).
	Manage social media accounts, create content, and engage with followers.
	Optimize website content for SEO to improve organic search rankings.
	Create and distribute engaging email marketing campaigns.
	Conduct market research to identify trends and new marketing opportunities.
	Plan and execute paid advertising campaigns (PPC, social media ads, display ads).
	Analyze campaign performance using tools like Google Analytics and provide insights for improvement.
	Collaborate with the content and design teams to create compelling marketing materials.
	Stay updated on industry trends, tools, and best practices.


Qualifications & Skills


	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or a related field.
	2+ years of experience in digital marketing.
	Proficiency in SEO, PPC, Google Ads, and social media marketing.
	Experience with marketing tools such as Google Analytics, SEMrush, HubSpot, or similar.
	Strong copywriting and content creation skills.
	Ability to analyze data and generate actionable insights.
	Excellent communication and project management skills.
	Knowledge of graphic design tools (Canva, Adobe Suite) is a plus.
	Certification in Google Ads, Facebook Blueprint, or HubSpot is an advantage.


Salary
N150,000 per month. 

Benefits:


	Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.
	Career growth and professional development opportunities.
	Health and wellness benefits (if applicable).
	A creative and dynamic work environment.

title: Warehouse Associate Job at Alan & Grant
content:
Alan & Grant - Our client is a tech-led platform that connects informal retailers around Africa who retail in Kiosks and other similar retail outlets.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Warehouse Associate

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The ideal candidate will be responsible for fulfilling the logistics behind receiving, processing, and storing inventory according to purchase orders and store policy.


Key Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Receiving and processing incoming stock and materials,
	Maintaining and tracking inventory.
	Fulfilling customer orders correctly.
	Examine incoming and outgoing products.
	Organize warehouse space.
	Process, package and ship orders accurately.
	Organize stocks and maintain inventory.
	Inspect products for defects and damages.
	Receive, unload and place incoming inventory items appropriately.
	Check, verify and fill in customer invoices


Requirements


	1-2 years of warehouse experience preferred.
	B.Sc/HND in any field
	Excellent organisational, communication, and teamwork skills.
	Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, meeting productivity standards.
